website_summaries.verdict: Synthetic-covered football that will give you great value and performance.
pros: Extremely low price for regulation-size football
Available in both junior and official sizes so you can find the right model for your needs
Synthetic material has the right level of grip to allow for play in all kinds of weather
cons: Some models may not hold air properly after regular use

customer_reviews.title: Love going DEEP!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh we love going deep and long with this. It’s so smooth when I release and brings us both so much satisfaction. Keep it up Can’t give a rating on durability yet as we just started using it. But we love going back and forth, long and deep. Hopefully it will last a while
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A great inexpensive ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is great for the price. It's just a little cheaper than the Duke replica, but if you're buying a lot of balls it adds up. The color is a dark brown compared with the leather duke (top) and composite duke (left). So it's not perfect there. The composite material feels slightly worse than the composite duke. If you were only buying one ball id get one of the Dukes, but if you're buying 3+ balls that are just gonna get torn up from practice get this one.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It's all good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for tailgating in a parking lot. I didn't want to spend a lot for a leather ball. I read the reviews and ordered it so I could get another just in case. It arrived in a Wilson box, well inflated. Unless something goes incredibly wrong, what a deal. Seams are straight. No bulges. No obvious issues. Less than $20. If the game goes this well, I can't hope for more.
customer_reviews.author: k mitala

customer_reviews.title: Very nice football. The feel of the football is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very nice football. The feel of the football is amazing, and it has great grip. It is definitely a great football, and I would recommend this for football enthusiasts who love a good game in the backyard on Sundays. My initial product did come defective (with a giant cut across the skin), but I believe that was due to shipping accident and they agreed to replace it for free so I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Identity

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in the quality of the football
customer_reviews.text: Bought this football as a Christmas present for my son. The football arrived inflated ready to use. The grip on the ball feels great and helps to catch and throw it a lot easier. These two pros is why I added 1 extra star. Now for the upsetting part of the ball that I received, the outer lining wasn't stitched right and it stuck out of the lacing. What's more upsetting is that this flaw got passed the quality control at Wilson which makes me not trust in their quality and workmanship. I guess I'll keep the ball and take it as it is. It's not like I'm going to play with it professionally. Buyers please beware of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. Showed up fully inflated
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Showed up fully inflated. It has not lost any air in the 3 months I have had it. It is really grippy and for all intents and purposes like any other ball in this price category. That being said, the fact that it holds air as well as it does and has not delaminated or come apart at the seams makes it well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: as84

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual play excellent Grip
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect Football to have a backyard game or juts to chill with friends , the grip is actually pretty good the aerodynamic is a bit off on long passes because it feels a bit lighter than other footballs but to be honest this item is perfect For casual play or for warmups , I like the color and the way it feels on your hand 100% recommended football for casual play
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grip, tight spiral.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grip on a football. I have two boys 12 and 10 year old that play with this. We had previously bought this same football about 2 years ago it was fine until my kids kicked it up on top of my roof where it sat there for a couple weeks during the rainy season and the football lost its grip. so dont leave it out and it will last a long time. best grip! other Wilson footballs don't have as much grip. throws a nice tight spiral. I can throw this 50 yards across the football field accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Lentz

customer_reviews.title: What you expect and hope for
customer_reviews.text: I was going abroad and my cousins always ask me about football there because they are used to 'futbol' or soccer. I decided it was time they learn to throw a spiral. We used it quite a bit and everyone was happy. I expected it to cost more considering the quality. Came pumped.
customer_reviews.author: Alex  Review Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Defected
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and it came deflated. So I went and got a pump, pumped it up and a couple hours later it was deflated again. I tried inflating it yet again and again it lost all of its air shortly after. Wouldn’t ever purchase one again, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Best football you can buy for this price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was hesitant to buy a football for this price but I pulled the trigger after reading all the great reviews. This football has lived up to the hype. As someone who has spent $86 on a football I can honesty say this is a great football. Throws amazing, very durable and it’s NFL sized. Would make for a good Christmas gift. One of my proudest purchases. 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.author: John boughton

customer_reviews.title: Great grip and spiral.
customer_reviews.text: If you have some bigger hands this ball is fantastic. Can really put some zip on this ball and sticks like your wearing gloves. I even love using it for kicking practice. My students and I use it daily at recess and it holds up very well too!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive football
customer_reviews.text: This is a great football to have around the house. The football is sorta tacky so there is some decent grip to it. Main issue was with the screen printed logo as it's really slick. I'm sure, over time, it'll get scuffed and hopefully add a bit more grip to the ball. Overall, great football to have.
customer_reviews.author: LouRevue

customer_reviews.title: Good for some light fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my roommates and I to throw around outside when the weather is nice. I'm not familiar with what footballs should be like in terms of make and material, but it seems nice to me. We weren't too rough with it, but it did end up getting a rip in the outside material after only 20-30 minutes of throwing back and forth. If you're someone who actually plays football, this one's probably not for you, but it serves my needs well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered/as advertised. Actually, better considering the discounted pricing during Amazon Prime Days. Would have spent $30 for same item @ local Walmart. Prompt delivery - actually arrived a day ahead of schedule. Ready to play catch with my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy a regulation size football as a gift for someone. When I saw this deal I couldn't believe it. Since I only had a jr size I decided to buy 2 of these, one as a gift and one for my family. I have small hands and often have trouble gripping full size footballs making it awkward to throw. The grip on this one was excellent and I had no trouble gripping and throwing this one. The super grip makes it easy to catch as well. Not sure if it will maintain the grip over time but good first impressions.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Well well...
customer_reviews.text: ... great football! Our neighbors throw theirs by mistake into our yard and our dog thought someone gifted him a new toy! Ok their football didn’t last long after our dog was done with it. So I decided to get a new one for our neighbors and bought that one here. Price was ok and the quality is good! It’s has a really nice feel and grip. I’m sure our neighbors will be happy and I’m gonna order another one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: supp

customer_reviews.title: It's a football.
customer_reviews.text: It's a football. It works. You can throw it and catch it. It has a perfectly good football shape. And even though Ralphie wanted a Red Ryder BB Gun instead of a football, I'm sure he still would have enjoyed this football too. Highly recommend. Unless, of course, you'd rather have a BB gun.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy/Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this football to practice with my son who plays youth tackle and flag football. We have been using this ball for about 7 or 8 months now on a weekly basis. It has been left in the car on a hot day, abused on the field and involved in many practice sessions. It has held up great and really hasn't shown any wear.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It means everything
customer_reviews.text: We gave this, a basketball, and a hand air pump to a child living in a shelter whose name appeared on our church's Giving Tree. From the feedback we got this was a really great gift. I think a better gift would be for him to be adopted by a caring family. Maybe next year he'll get that gift.
customer_reviews.author: lightbg

customer_reviews.title: Great football
customer_reviews.text: Great football overall but unfortunately on the first day out with it my cousin kicked it into a tree on accident and a branch somehow pierced directly through it and stuck into it.. instantly deflating and destroying the ball lol. really liked the feel of this ball but now its constantly out of stock :(
customer_reviews.author: Kim Mossett

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE FOOTBALL
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED. Received it about 3 weeks ago. It was only used once or twice a week and it already has a lump on it. Also, the title states "super grip football". The grip was insane when I first received the ball but after the first two or three uses it has worse grip than many other footballs. DISAPPOINTED with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Time with sons
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a review on a football. I do not really know much about quality of a football. But I bought this to play with my sons, who also do not know the quality of footballs. We have a great time. I think every day should try playing with their sons. Do it before they grow up too much and realize who terrible of football player you might be.
customer_reviews.author: Truthwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a lemon but beware
customer_reviews.text: This ball developed a bubble after the first use. We didn't do anything you wouldn't expect with a football. Threw it, kicked it (a couple of punts), etc. Hard to say if this is a theme, but the quality seems very bad.
customer_reviews.author: Floppywangz

customer_reviews.title: Sure enough, This is a football
customer_reviews.text: This ia an official size football. Wish I chose the youth as my son's hands is way small. He can still launch it and at 11 years old he can throw a perfect spiral about half the time. Near perfect the other half. The grip is very good.
customer_reviews.author: mrovationguitar

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC BUY
customer_reviews.text: This standardized football is great for outdoor fun and it's made sturdy. It will last through many games. The outside is easy to grip and throw. This will be entertainment for many family reunions,
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Really bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, bought three and two deflated after two months of use. Only one is in great condition. Did not expect to be buying more so soon. It’s a shame because they have a nice grip.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Olaiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice football for the money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a football to toss around with my boy but didn't want to spend a lot of money. I bought this with low expectations - the football was MUCH nicer than I expected. For the money I paid, it was a bargain! The ONLY drawback I have is the laces are very pronounced. They will sting your hand occasionally. Other than that, a great back yard ball.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Water Brands

customer_reviews.title: Merica...
customer_reviews.text: Brought it with me to Europe because my cousin had a friend who's brother-in-law's wife's brother's friend wanted one....never touched one in person. It didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: iLikeWaffles

customer_reviews.title: The best junior size ball for kids
customer_reviews.text: I coach 12 and 13 year old flag football. This ball is the best of the many I've used. It has the best grip making it the easiest to catch and throw.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not for pets!
customer_reviews.text: This thing peals apart after a few throws. Not going to purchase again. Other balls are glued to the bladder and thus are more durable. This thing was made cheap.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect footballs for my 10 yr old grandson
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old grandson asked if I'd buy a few footballs so he could practice throwing. Wilson excellent quality, good grip and best you can get. Footballs come in retail box.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderman

customer_reviews.title: Great Football - Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew wanted a football for Christmas so I bought him this one and he loves it. The Wilson brand footballs is the only brand that I will ever trust and purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Thin soft skin tore open after hitting something a little rough
customer_reviews.text: Tore open after hit something a little rough. Thin skin covering. Not durable. Lasted 2 days throwing with 7 and 9 y/o children. Might be ok if you use it only in grassy parks, but won’t survive very long in texas. Unfortunately return window closed 6 days ago.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo guy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite football
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite football for every day playing. Great grip, great size. Nothing to complain about, really. I would absolutely love if they made this line in the USA in addition to their Duke football. I would pay the extra cost for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Football
customer_reviews.text: This football comes ready to go out the box. It’s good quality leather and looks good. It’s got good seams for gripping. Overall what you see is what you get: a good football ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Roy of Columbia

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice when new. Loses grip FAST!
customer_reviews.text: The ball was super nice when you get it, value is great. Only problem is it comes super grippy but we have used it for around 2 months and this is on grass and it's already lost 50 percent of it's grip. So the durability is pretty bad
customer_reviews.author: Abhi K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an upcoming party and I also just love throwing a football around. Can’t say much else other than it’s just a great football!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball,Durable,Great Name & Value!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson for Christmas. It is high quality, extremely durable, and was the right 'size' (not youth). It was a great value. I'd recommend this football to any football enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great football at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal product. Feels great. Nice grip. Throws well. Feels like it's worth 3 times the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Derminator

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball  excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball for the price perfect for all the neighborhood kids. Very durable and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: BandMbargain

customer_reviews.title: Terrific item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great football, especially for the price. My 14 yr old nephew wanted to learn more about football so I got him this one. He plays with it all of the time. Great quality for an even better price!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Great Football
customer_reviews.text: Surprising quality for the price, used it a lot and there is very little noticeable wear on the ball. Took a bit to throw a tight spiral with this ball, seems to be a little cheaply sewn at the tips of the ball, but after a bit of practice I was back to throwing tight spirals. Ball surface is nice and tacky, easy to catch even without gloves. I would definitely recommend the purchase of this ball, Left one star off for the build quality on the seams. I fear it might not last as long as a better ball but it is holding up perfectly fine for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good for fun in backyard, nice grip, not as soft as expensive balls, but not rock hard either. A nice-looking value football.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this Wilson product. We have always preferred the Wilson football over other brands and tried to replace an older model that had been discontinued. We finally inflated this football to play with and it is defective. It deflated after a few hours of sitting on a shelf. I will seek to return and hopefully find this is simply a fluke. All other Wilson footballs have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Lines

customer_reviews.title: Great grip and a great cause
customer_reviews.text: A good ball for this price point. Very grippable and flies straight. Really appreciate that this company will donate a ball for this review! Great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Garner

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold any air
customer_reviews.text: This football came deflated. We pumped it up and it will not hold a pump. My son was so disappointed and upset. I can’t return it because my son was so excited to get it that he threw away the packaging when he got it. This was a complete waste of money. I wish I could get a new one shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great guy gift too!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present and is his all time favorite football now. :) so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vikkigabriella

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY. DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Football came deflated. I had to separately buy the needle to inflate it and the next morning I woke up and it was deflated again. Obviously a bad quality product. It would have been fine to return it but I took it on a weekend trip and didnt get to use it which was super disappointing and had to buy one while I was on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best Football I Own
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a ton of footballs and this is definitely one of the best I've ever bought. Good shape, nice and grippy, easy to make one-handed catches, tight spirals. It's junior size so your hard core football buddies might give you crap, but it's way more fun to toss around than a huge NFL or college size ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome football!
customer_reviews.text: Official size but easier to grip than Official/NFL game balls. Great for throwing around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip that feels nice - but I don't think this would hold up to a rough play surface and could scrape off. Play on a grass field or dirt, not on asphalt road.
customer_reviews.author: nickelback

customer_reviews.title: Wilson NFL Super Grip Football, Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good product for football, throwing good, and catching good, feeling good. Delivered on time on the day of my sister birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Dung Duong

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought the football for my class to use at recess. Two days out of the box and I'm having to pump it up daily. It won't hold air. Disappointed big time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J.

customer_reviews.title: Good size for teenagers and adults who aren’t big football players.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a classic football. Nice for throwing, catching, and kicking... even great for snuggling up on the couch with.
customer_reviews.author: ForeignMovie

customer_reviews.title: Right High School size, great quality, great feel
customer_reviews.text: I have a High School football player. This is the same size and just like the one they use which is what I was looking for. Great quality and feel too!
customer_reviews.author: GMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Football starting in Taiwan will man up Taiwanese students.
customer_reviews.text: Taiwan will start the sport of football from an elementary school of 32 students and 13 teachers in a mountain with the brand new NFL football I purchased. May my football passion light up the sparkle for Taiwan football sport. The football was not made well-detailed. Not sure if this is common for all footballs? Perfect grip, everything perfect
customer_reviews.author: Simon P. James

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great! Haven’t used enough to comment on durability yet, but VERY NICE for the Price. I Coach Football and these are Great 👍
customer_reviews.author: J STIXXX

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine before air port messed up
customer_reviews.text: The little air port eventually goofed up and got sideways to where we couldn’t fit a needle inside to air it up anymore. Worked fine before that.
customer_reviews.author: Online connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: Really like this ball. Purchase for our annual Thanksgiving flag football game. It was big enough for the adults but easy enough for the older kids to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Augustin

customer_reviews.title: Have a ball.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my brother for Christmas, and he absolutely loves it! It’s easy to grip. It’s your standard NFL size football! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect for kids flag football
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 years olds flag football league, the team ended up making this the "game ball" because the size and grip is just right for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: Developed a bulge at the side within two weeks of use, with air pressure untouched since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Sepp Meier

customer_reviews.title: Nice “Grippy” Football
customer_reviews.text: Nice “grippy” football for my grade school grandsons. Full size but easier for them to spiral. Good value. Not too expensive; but tough enough for outdoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald Uber

customer_reviews.title: Grippy
customer_reviews.text: It feels a little light but good size and great grip. Come out of your hand nice and is easy to catch too. The grip makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: fswill89

customer_reviews.title: budget football
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done but could be better. Great for what you pay for but the quality is inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Good football
customer_reviews.text: This football is perfect for our 11 year old son. It exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Boyd

customer_reviews.title: My friend threw this great spiral, and it jammed my finger pretty damn ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend threw this great spiral, and it jammed my finger pretty damn hard. I couldn't play with it for over a month, but everybody continued to throw perfect spirals, so I guess the quality's good
customer_reviews.author: Major

customer_reviews.title: Very good football for an okay price.
customer_reviews.text: The grip of very good, the shape was a little awkward at the edge of the ball but wasn't very noticeable. Perfect size ball for throwing accurate spirals throws. The texture feels really nice too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ball good!
customer_reviews.text: If you want those sweet Odell snags to impress the ladies, this is the ball for you. Very nice ball and a grip so good Nelson Agholor could catch it!.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Hill

customer_reviews.title: It shows up deflated
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. This football shows up deflated! Ordered to donate to a toy drive and now I need to find someone with a pump and the right needle quick.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Mill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my middle school-aged kids
customer_reviews.text: Good grip, perfect size. My middle school-aged kids love throwing this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball
customer_reviews.text: Grippable, relatively durable, and overall just a fun ball to throw.
customer_reviews.author: VRF

customer_reviews.title: I love throwing this football!
customer_reviews.text: Great football to toss around. Tacky outer makes it easier to throw and catch. I prefer this over the duke, but both are great balls.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Great value pro size and weight football
customer_reviews.text: Great football to toss around in the grass. Just dont let it get wet! Not for little kids that have tiny hands.
customer_reviews.author: who's bad

customer_reviews.title: Touchdown
customer_reviews.text: I love my football. It's fun to just hold and play with the ball while I watch games on Sunday. Plus me and the kid can throw it around in the yard. It's a great street ball, because it appears very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Terry Lee Neal

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My 3 boys have been playing with this for months now and love it! It has held up well, unlike some others. Nice ball, well made and not cheap looking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 7 year old. Awesome quality, ball is just a tad big for his hands but totally manageable. Also a bit over inflated so I had to let out some air to soften it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Justin323032

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a regulation size ball
customer_reviews.text: It says Junior size but it sure seems like a regular size football. I'm 6ft 200lb and it fits my hand like a regulation size ball. My 9yr old likes it, he just wishes it were a little smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Beeswax

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: I got it super quick and with the optimal amount of air inside. It does a great spiral and i just cant believe how cheap it was. Really nice to the touch and very good to handle. I live in Idaho so sometimes it gets wet but I can still throw it really easily and nicely. Great ball!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Jessen

customer_reviews.title: Must have for football fans!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every dollar! The football was inflated and ready for action. Great gift idea. It’s always good to have one in the car and one in the garage. Not durable enough for cement play. But that means you need it for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Nilo MD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Football - Should last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.text: This was for a Christmas gift for a 16 year old teenager. Best price around. Walmart would not price match so I bought from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gloster - The Golden Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: However my son has a few footballs and this seemed high quality and it looked great.
customer_reviews.text: This was for a donation to a local homeless shelter for Christmas, so we didn't actually PLAY with the ball. However my son has a few footballs and this seemed high quality and it looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for junior. The ball truly has a super grip!
customer_reviews.text: This Wilson ball is aptly named. All the NFL Flag team members agree - it does have a super grip. Everyone on the team gave this ball 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Gail N.

customer_reviews.title: great football
customer_reviews.text: great for the money. not NFL standard size but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Heavyhitter1015

customer_reviews.title: Football!
customer_reviews.text: It's a football. What else can I say. Hopefully it can still hold it's grip after the half a year.
customer_reviews.author: Chris. T

customer_reviews.title: Quality Football
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the great quality of this football for this price. Just like the one I had as a boy. It seems that not everything is getting poorer quality and higher priced. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great football!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, who is very athletic and loves playing football. It came safely packaged and well inflated. I don’t know much about football, but my boyfriend said it was a great size. It’s too big if you have small girl hands like I do, but the grip is secure and works great to make the ball much more manageable
customer_reviews.author: lilkluttzy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size, I like the junior ball much more the full size ball for playing with friends.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Size, I like the junior ball much more the full size ball for playing with friends. Mid Thirties Male.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed, highly recommended. It's fully size, feels great, and is well made.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shocked at the quality and feel of this ball for the price. No, it's not a 120 dollar official NFL football, but it's as close as you can get to one for a fraction of the cost. Very impressed, highly recommended. It's fully size, feels great, and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Arok5

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this and you cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen A. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons have loved playing with it. Not sure how long it will hold up but for now they love it and are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: It’s a football, I use it to play catch with friends.
customer_reviews.author: BruhGurl

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to break in.
customer_reviews.text: When you first get it, it won’t fly like a normal football. Not something you can take right out of the package and play a game with. BUT, give it time. Break it in. Let it get beat up on the ground some. Cause after that it is an exceptional football for its price. I’ve bought three now and broke them in. Great buy for those who want a high quality football for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pucylowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice football
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about footballs, but this one seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Churning Soul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Drew a name of a boy at church that wanted a football for Christmas. So happy to have found this!!
customer_reviews.author: Styler B

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early and not problems.
customer_reviews.text: Is very good. Will be a gift to a friend. I just was hoping was made in America but is made in china . After that is no problem is a goid product.
customer_reviews.author: marlise w reschke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Football. I’m actually surprised by the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually expecting this football to be rather cheaply made, since the cost was about half of what similar ones cost at our local sporting goods stores. I have a few other brands on hand that cost $40-50. But this football is our go-to ball to play with! I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my teenage son, perfect. It's the large size football which I like, nice grip too.
customer_reviews.author: Ginalollobrigida

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: A great football at a low cost. Felt soft and grippy and the boys loved it
customer_reviews.author: Nychelle Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Wilson NFL Super Grip Football
product_meta.description: Football is a game of will. Take hold of the game with the NFL Supergrip. Made with a high-performance composite material, this football offers the ideal blend of durability, grip and performance worthy of the official NFL logo and the game's best players; whatever league they play in.
feature_bullets: Super grip composite cover for a premium feel
Butyl rubber bladder for advanced air retention
